word_mean: 旋转，转动：绕轴转动的过程
物体围绕其轴(所谓转轴)运动
分娩时胎头旋转90°，使其长径与盆腔外口长径一致
该过程应自然发生，但若未转，则产科医生必须徒手或以器械使之完成。另见maneuver
围绕中心轴而无任何偏移的旋转，另见movement项下hingemovement
将错扭转的牙齿转至其正常位置
牙齿围绕其纵轴异常转动引起的错位
天体或天体系统绕质心的定点旋转。
rotation-vibration band   又称“振转［谱］带”。

sentence.Network_en: Within the project, trees are selectively cut on a 25-year rotation.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照这个计划，将以25年为一个轮伐期对树木进行有选择的砍伐。

sentence.Network_en: the diurnal rotation of the earth
the daily rotation of the earth on its axis

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... rotating magnetic field 旋转磁场 rotation 自转，转动 Rutherford scattering 卢瑟福散射.
自字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 自传〖 autobiography〗 自转〖 rotation〗 自装〖 self-chambering〗.
直到1992年终于有一个轮转（rotation）的研究生答应做衰老方面的课题。实验进行得很顺利，但这个研究生还是不愿意继续。
在flash里规定:在旋转角度（rotation）里的角，以“度”为单位；而在三角函数里的角要以“弧度”为单位。这个规定是我们首先要记住的！…

list.abs: 航海及海运专业英语词汇(R5) ... rotating 旋转的转动的 rotating 转动的 rotating-blade propeller 平旋推进器.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... resistor 电阻器 rotator 旋转器 flexor 曲肌.
转字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 转轴，转轴儿〖 spinaxis〗 转子〖 rotator〗 转字锁〖 combinationlock〗.
旋转也可通过选择定位菜单下的旋转(Rotate)指令完成。你可在对话框中输入固定角度来完成。
... circle 环绕； rotate 旋转，循环； wind 缠绕。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin rotatio(n-), from the verb rotare (see rotate)

entry.def: Rotation is circular movement. A rotation is the movement of something through one complete circle.

example.ex: ...the daily rotation of the earth upon its axis.

entry.def: The rotation of a group of things or people is the fact of them taking turns to do a particular job or serve a particular purpose. If people do something in rotation, they take turns to do it.

example.ex: He grew a different crop on the same field five years in a row, what researchers call crop rotation...
example.tran: 他连续5年在同一块地里种植不同的作物，研究人员称之为轮作。

example.ex: Once a month we met for the whole day, and in rotation each one led the group.
example.tran: 我们每个月聚在一起一整天，轮流担任领队。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of rotating as if on an axis;

sentences.sentence: "the rotation of the dancer kept time with the music"

means.word_mean: 2. (mathematics) a transformation in which the coordinate axes are rotated by a fixed angle about the origin
3. a single complete turn (axial or orbital);

sentences.sentence: "the plane made three rotations before it crashed"
"the revolution of the earth about the sun takes one year"

means.word_mean: 4. a planned recurrent sequence (of crops or personnel etc.);

sentences.sentence: "crop rotation makes a balanced demand on the fertility of the soil"
"the manager had only four starting pitchers in his rotation"

stems_affixes.word_buile: rot轮子,转,滚+ary表形容词→adj.旋转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旋转的,转动的;循环的;交替的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rotate[v.[使]旋转]+ory……的→adj.旋转的,转动的;循环的;交替的
rot轮子,转,滚+und→转一圈→圆的,胖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [机]转子, 回转轴, 转动体
stems_affixes.word_buile: rot轮子,转,滚+or物器→n.[机]转子, 回转轴, 转动体
rotund圆胖的+ity表名词→n.球状,圆形
rot轮子,转,滚+ate表动词→v.[使]旋转

sentences.en: Crop rotation helps prevent soil erosion.
sentences.cn: 农作物轮作有助于防止水土流失。
